Package at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.common

This package contains all the things, that are used by the daemon and the interface library.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AdapterConfiguration
    This is the base interface of all configurations, describing the implemented adapters.
    GathererConfiguration
    This is the base interface of all configurations, describing the implemented gatherers.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BufferConfiguration
    This is simply a data container describing the features of a buffer.
    DummyAdapterConfiguration
    A DUMMY-adapter has no configuration features.
    DummyGathererConfiguration
    A DUMMY-gatherer works as actor and accepts any value.
    FilteringAdapterConfiguration
    A filtering adapter suppresses marginal input value changes.
    LowpassAdapterConfiguration
    A lowpass adapter acts as lowpass filter.
    ScalingAdapterConfiguration
    A scaling adapter calculates an output value y based on the current input value x using the equation: y = a * x**2 + b * x + c The factors a, b and c have to be configurated.
    SimpleData
    A simple data container, containing the current information about a single buffer.
    TestGathererConfiguration
    This gatherer increments the current value by 0.1 every second.
    TriggeringAdapterConfiguration
    A triggering adapter toggle between the two output values "lowerOutput" and "upperOutput".
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AdapterClass
    An enumeration of all available kinds of adapter.
    BufferClass
    This enumeration selects between the basic classes of buffers.
    BufferState
    Here are the states defined, which DataPoints and buffers may encounter during their lifecycle.
    GathererClass
    An enumeration of all available kinds of gatherers.

Package at.ac.tuwien.infosys.g2021.common Description

This package contains all the things, that are used by the daemon and the interface library.
